title: How to Remove a Telegram Bot on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad. It’s a blue and white paper airplane icon typically found on the home screen. A list of your chats will appear.

steps.title: Swipe left on the chat with the bot.
steps.content: Swipe left on the chat with the bot. You may have to scroll down to find it. Several icons will then slide out on the right.

steps.title: Tap Delete on the chat.
steps.content: Tap Delete on the chat. It’s the red icon with a trashcan inside. Additional options will expand.

steps.title: Tap Delete and Stop.
steps.content: Tap Delete and Stop . It’s at the bottom of the screen. This stops the bot and deletes the chat.

steps.title: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad. It’s a blue and white paper airplane icon typically found on the home screen. A list of your chats will appear. Use this method to stop the bot without deleting the chat.

steps.title: Tap the chat with the bot.
steps.content: Tap the chat with the bot. You may have to scroll down to find it. The conversation will appear.

steps.title: Tap the bot’s profile icon.
steps.content: Tap the bot’s profile icon. It’s in a circle at the top-right corner of the conversation.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Stop bot.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Stop bot . It’s at the bottom of the screen in red text. This stops the bot without deleting the conversation.
